text: The 2009–19 Cruz Azul season was the 50th season in the football club's history and the 46th consecutive season in the top flight of Mexican football. The club participated in the Apertura and Bicentenario tournaments of the Mexican Primera División and in the CONCACAF Champions League. ==Coaching staff== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:100%; width:35%;" |- !
